member.name: T:RecordsetNet.DataTypes
member.summary: Converts CLR types to ADODB types.

member.name: M:RecordsetNet.DataTypes.TryGetAdoTypeForClrType(System.Type,ADODB.DataTypeEnum@)
member.summary: Get the appropriate ADODB type for a given CLR type.
member.param: The CLR type to look for.
The ADODB type that matches the CLR type, if any.
member.returns: True if an ADODB type was found.
